title: Either it's my GPU or the game, but..
body: With each patch, I keep getting stutters in my game. This recent patch, it got to the point where something like a tower blowing up or blitzcrank ulting would freeze my screen. What gives?

replies.body:
Your instinct might be right that it could be a type of bad hardware/software interaction with your computer and League.  Since it will eventually completely freeze or lock up your screen, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Game Crash Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).  The steps there should resolve this issue and get everything running smoothly once more.

Feel free to let me know if it doesn't!
